name: id
description: The element ID of the input.

name: selectionRange
description: The selection range of the input.

name: clearButtonEnabled
description: Determines if the input should have a clear button.

name: clearButtonAccessibleLabel
description: The accessible label of the clear button.

name: defaultValue
description: The default value of the input.

name: disabled
description: Determines if the input is disabled.

name: label
description: The label of the input element.

name: inlineLabel
description: Determines if the label will be displayed next to the input field.

name: errorMessage
description: The error message to be displayed below the input.

name: errorMessageDebouncedTime
description: Determines if the message line should be fixed.

name: fixMessageLine
description: The time in milliseconds to debounce the error message visibility.

name: descriptionMessage
description: The description message to be displayed below the input.

name: readOnly
description: Determines if the input is read-only.

name: requiredMark
description: Determines if a required mark (*) should be displayed next to the label.

name: passwordPolicy
description: The password policy if the `type` is set to `password`. Please refer to the component source for the `PasswordPolicy` type definition.

name: generatePasswordMethod
description: The method to generate a password if the `type` is set to `password`.

name: hasBorder
description: Determines if the input field has a surrounding border.
